document.full_text: a belgian bishop who resigned last year after admitting he sexually abused a boy in the 1980s cannot be prosecuted because the offense took place too long ago, the prosecutor said monday.
document.title: europe: belgium: bishop cannot be charged
lines_and_colors: a belgian bishop who resigned last year after admitting he sexually abused a boy in the 1980s cannot be prosecuted because the offense took place too long ago, the prosecutor said monday.
